author: cnbc.com
title: Sanderson Farms, Inc. to Host Its Second Quarter Fiscal 2018 Conference Call
text:
LAUREL, Miss.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Sanderson Farms, Inc. (NASDAQ: SAFM) today announced that it will host its second quarter fiscal 2018 earnings conference call at 10:00 a.m. Central time, 11:00 a.m. Eastern time, on Thursday, May 24, 2018. During this call, management will comment on Sanderson Farms’ financial and operating results for the second quarter ended April 30, 2018. Those who wish to participate in the call may do so by dialing 800-967-7140 (Conference Code 1550612).
A live online broadcast of Sanderson Farms’ conference call will also begin at 10:00 a.m. Central time, 11:00 a.m. Eastern time, on Thursday, May 24, 2018. An online replay will be available approximately two hours following the conclusion of the live broadcast and will continue through Thursday, May 31, 2018. The link to this event may be found at the investor relations section of the Company’s website, www.sandersonfarms.com . A telephone replay will begin approximately two hours after the call ends and will be available for seven days. To listen to the telephone playback, please dial 888-203-1112 (Conference Code 1550612).
Sanderson Farms, Inc. is engaged in the production, processing, marketing and distribution of fresh, frozen and minimally prepared chicken. Its shares trade on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol SAFM.
